categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic regiments

nodes.text: The 101st Regiment was a regiment of the Grand Army of the Republic under the command of Jedi Padawan Danyawarra. The 101st was part of the 7th Legion, and consisted of well over 2,000 clone troopers. During the Clone Wars, Danyawarra accepted a position as Jedi Commander, and took on the leadership of the 101st Regiment.
